hero.title: Hello! I‘m Yevhen
hero.subtitle:
Hello! I’m Yevhen. I’m a web developer, problem solver, and clean-code enthusiast.
I build digital experiences that are fast, accessible, and made to last.
bullets: Solve problems without creating new ones

vision.title:
From idea
to product
vision.text:
I turn ideas into responsive web solutions — from rough sketches to fully functional websites.
My process blends planning, design, and clean development.

past.title: In a previous life
past.subtitle: I used to do some things that I am not really doing anymore

items.title: Joomla Development
items.text: Built and maintained dynamic websites using Joomla CMS.

items.title: osCommerce Development
items.text: Developed and customized online stores using osCommerce and PHP.

items.title: Entrepreneurship
items.text: Founded and managed my own small company, overseeing client projects and workflow.

items.title: Windows Server Setup & Administration
items.text: Configured and managed Windows-based servers for small business environments.

contact.title: Let‘s talk
contact.text: I‘m always looking forward to new opportunities, ping me if you have any!

impressum.title: Legal Notice (Impressum)
